difficulty.title: Updated boss difficulty tier list : r/darksouls3 - Reddit
difficulty.body: Ancient Wyvern Oceiros, the Consumed King Twin Princes, Lorian and Lothric For the most part, none of the base game bosses are difficult, just a nuisance. 1st run I died hella more to the Ancient Wyvern than Gwyn's son, and more to almost any boss than Soul of Cinder since he basically uses the same moveset as Abyss Watchers in Phase 2.

difficulty.title: Dark Souls 3 Bosses Ranked by Difficulty - Game Voyagers
difficulty.body: Let us see where bosses are ranked difficulty-wise in Dark Souls 3. Related: The Best Weapons in Dark Souls 3. Because of this, the difficulty will be highly subjective. strategy.title: How To Defeat Ancient Wyvern Boss In Dark Souls 3 - TheGamer
strategy.body: Ancient Wyvern is a boss in Dark Souls 3. This boss fight is optional and acts as a gimmick fight. ... The strategy for this boss is quite simple. The boss is quite strong against all kinds of status effects. However, it is weak against plunging attacks. What you need to do is make your way to the left doorway as soon as you reach the dragon ...
